comment: He is a great guy. The midterm and final consist of 100 vocab words each, Matching. It is a little difficult. There are weekly quizzes. Each quiz is open book. The group project isn't too bad.

Terrible professor. He is very rude, boring and doesn't know what he's even talking about. You have a quiz every week over 2 chapters which are 25 questions and are hard. He doesn't explain anything or listen to other peoples opinions; he's always right and you're always wrong. Don't take him. There were only 2 A's out of the 35 students.
AVOID TAKING IF POSSIBLE, ACTS LIKE HE CARES BUT TRULY DOES NOT.

Great guy. He cares about his students, and makes sure they understand the material, If they ask him for help. Make sure you read the book! That is a major portion of the grade. you will have several quiz over what you read.
